title: What Happened to the RoA Changes?
body:
[Rod of Ages Rework](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8fSJ4kUYAAaxf2.png)            
            
[Dev Update](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-gb/2019/07/dev-life-of-a-patch/)       
          
So Riot didn't want to add it in the middle of the season even though it was testing well because it may cause big fluctuations in the middle of the season which is fine, but where are the changes now for the preseason? Please don't forget about it. They spent time and effort and now they are wasting a great opportunity to test them out for the community.

Most likely because he wasn't widely played prior to Worlds.
Now that people see how broken he can be, he's being played everywhere in every ELO, hence more complaints.

Feelsbad because everyone called my blue homie dogshit. Honestly the problem is they made him easy to play. Just 1 eq and he destroys range minions at level 6 I feel like his old kit was healthier even though it was still unhealthy at least it took practice

for the low price of 140 mana at RANK 1 abilities. but most of these new posts are about how q passive + phase rush is so unfair but it wasn't unfair 3 years ago? just another thing to complain about. next they'll say that Q range is too far
Yup.
Make it melee only.
Also who would use this if it was melee only?
Diana, kassadin, ap shaco ekko. It would be a niche item. However i dont think making it melee is the right proposal. If one champ was to break an item, the champ should be nerfed not the item.

> [{quoted}](name=we havent met,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ks3EZ5JZ,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2019-11-17T21:40:48.746+0000)
>
> Diana, kassadin, ap shaco ekko. It would be a niche item. However i dont think making it melee is the right proposal. If one champ was to break an item, the champ should be nerfed not the item.

But if you add items that you know will make an champ broken as hell and nerf those champs then you kill their item diversity, since they now have to use it to be normal. 

Which kills the point of new items in the first place.

I think the difference here is, if it was gonna break everybody, tone down the item. That was a big reason why it was on the pbe.
Spear of Shojin is a great example of how it almost entirely killed top lane bruiser item diversity (God im glad that garbage item is about to be gone) 
I think we often need to look at testing and play through. Because the item itself could be a very very good bruiser item, even if not melee, i can think of at least 3 ap bruisers and 2 battlemages that could very much benefit from that item (even if toned down)
It's a lot of one of those things where you see all these new ad assassin items bringing so much diversity. Whereas ap champions haven't really gotten anything. Legitimately for 2 of my champions the core is literally "rush deathcap!" and it screams boring and mediocrity in comparison.

Also sorry if this is very jumbled my mind kinda scatters sometimes..

Riot is notoriously bad at minding player feedback on the PBE, several disasters have already passed through unimpeded and straight out to normal servers.

Like {{item:3161}} for instance, and as for them making more AD items, specifically lethality ones while AP is kinda neglected.....


I think a large issue with their attempts at making or reworking AP items is the fact that they were either extremely niche or had some manner of problem that prevented them from reaching wide use, such as {{item:3030}}  and {{item:3003}} .

They also failed to clarify which division of AP champs they wanted the items to be used for(assassin/fighter/mage class 1,2 and 3 etc) while this is something they´ve done a lot better when making AD or even tank items.

Like the new lethality assassin items, or Adaptive helm but of course some failures have occurred as well such as {{item:3095}} .


Well we can only hope they get to it eventually,  i mean i like using {{item:3116}}  and {{item:3151}} on say {{champion:82}}  but somehow the rest of my options just feel kinda off for a frontline fighter.


And do not worry about being a bit scatterbrained in your writing, it´s still clear and i am far from some literate pro either x)

agreed
they need to tune champions to fit a goal and tune the items to not be abusable no matter what your goal is
if they can find a way to make Diana into an ap bruiser proper i feel like this item would be good
If they don't do anything about these champs this item is just gonna be abused on as you said {{champion:245}}  and such

By the sounds of it, they might.
They want to get her back into a APish fighter/bruiser playstyle, but also let full AP diana exist. If that causes problems (keeping the full AP), just kill off the full AP assassin part. That playstyle was created to keep her alive as a champ when no changes were being done to help her. By fixing the fighter/bruiser part that playstyle if unhealthy should be removed, no offense full AP Diana mains.

This is Rito we're talking about, though. 

Look at Vlad. Basically played as an assassin because being tankier dies in the same amount of time while accomplishing less in the large majority of games. They aren't doing anything to make him any healthier by bringing him back towards his intended design. I'd put money on them being lazy with Diana as well.

They dare and they will get called out for it. Aatrox was the only decent toplaner that could win games and they wanted none of that (all they had to do was, ya know, fix toplane if they wanted more picks), so they guttered him 3 times this year. Giving us the Victorious skin as a pity gift (I wont have it on this account cuz the system chat bans people more than it will ban an obvious griefer).

They need to go hard on the preseason changes, i'm tired of the half assed shit. Mages (specifically burst mage items) need their items adjusted the fuck down, and ADCs (that are not Ez) need their stat stick power vs tankier targets to be nerfed slightly so they are forced to build the items that got changed FOR them. On top of the mage stuff, base stats and AP + Tank Itemization need changes.
And then make kassadin have better midgame hell no.
Then you take away one of his core items.
That item should definitely not exist.

It's not like the new lethality items are any more balanced, and yet they are going through with them.

So ... if they are adding those two items they might as well add that one to satisfy both ends (AD & AP).

Not balanced if they dont fix defensive stats. Quick reminder % pen applies first, and got changed to total, adding the target's base into the reduction equation. This is why most assassins/adcs (legit have to be uber indecent as an ADC to NOT deal damage (unless you are Ezreal itemizing poorly)) mages and their mothers are overkilling people through hard stack defensive.

I hope this shit never sees the light of day.

 fervor of battle but for mages
imagine actually liking this garbage change. what the fuck is wrong with people.

I liked the changes to the eternity passive but the madness passive change doesn't make any sense.  Many AP fighters and battle mages have low AP ratios because their kits revolve around DoTs or low cooldown spells, so getting AP from the passive instead of % damage increase sucks for them. I also don't think it should build into RoA. They just have to make {{item:3010}} as expensive and worth building as {{item:3802}} and also add another item for it to build into that isn't stacking like {{item:3030}} used to be.

I think this version of {{item:3027}}  would work better as a completely different item that is melee only. Ranged champs could just cheese the passive too well by stacking it with poke abilities. IDK if this would even be used first item on champs like {{champion:517}} and {{champion:131}} because {{item:3152}}  gives that instant spike you can use to force fights. Theres a reason the current {{item:3027}}  isnt used by them and thats because AP bruisers don't really scale for jack so they need their power early game. The only champs that use it are ones with mana scalings that already are scaling champs ex {{champion:13}} {{champion:38}} (who I rarely see using it nowadays most just go {{item:3003}} and never build {{item:3027}}  ). I've been saying this for a while but we already have decent AP bruiser items, it's {{item:3089}} which is forcing them to go full AP. We need an alternative to {{item:3089}} that scales with HP (like steraks) or at least give the AP bruisers health scalings in their kit.
That's way too good of an item to only cost 2700g with meaningful immediate core items.
yeah because 40 AP is too good of an item. Even if affectiveness of the item increases, that'd only be a max 80 AP item.
Ruck Fyze.

This item would be better off used as a new item completely, (and preferably made Melee only) so we could actually get our mage bruisers back without them being "tank OR Assassin" although thats currently somewhat both atm..... I want to play a mage bruiser but they just dont work with the items currently...

So they want to give Mages even more sustain on top of having access to Ravenous Hunter? Do they not already have some of the best defensive utilities in the game in both skills and items? 

>Playtests and feedback were pretty positive on the changes

Literally who and why do they seriously think its a positive change? How is this going to at all be healthy for the game and not upset the balance further into the Mages favor? What can melees do in response to Mages when said Mages out sustain them while being ranged at the same time?
Riot's allergic to fixing itemisation for AP fighters/bruisers lol
Well you see that's an item that scales with battle time, and here at Riot we want games over in 17 minutes or less for our Asian Overlords in the gaming cafe so it's either burst damage or bust.
